data.title: John Heard
data.text:
AKA John Matthew Heard, Jr.

Born: 7-Mar-1945

Birthplace: Washington, DC

Died: 21-Jul-2017

Location of death: Palo Alto, CA

Cause of death: unspecified

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: The Pelican Brief

Father: John Matthew Heard

Mother: Helen Sperling

Wife: Margot Kidder (actress, m. 1979, div. 1979)

Girlfriend: Sharon Heard (m. 1988, div. 1996, one daughter, one son)

Daughter: Annika

Son: Max (d. 2016)

Girlfriend: Melissa Leo (ex, one son, Heard was charged with stalking her in March 1997)

Son: John Matthew Heard ("Jack")

Wife: Lana Pritchard (m. 24-May-2010, div. 22-Dec-2010)

High School: Gonzaga College High School, Washington, DC

University: Clark University

University: Catholic University of America

Stalking Baltimore (1996)

Assault Baltimore (1996)

Telephone Harassment
